divs: Sighting DetailsI was volunteering at the ADA platform for disabled fans at the ACL Festival. The Cure was playing and I had been monitoring the cloud cover as we were expecting a heavy downpour and I wanted to be prepared for the rain. Many people on the platform noticed the lights and several people took pictures and video of the lights as they hovered and slowly moved west. One person said they were Chinese lanterns. They did have the apparent glow of candle but they also remained in a triangle formation during the entire event. The lights remained in a triangle formation and eventually disappeared into the cloud cover. At first I was very excited and could not believe my eyes. I even pointed it out to other patrons and workers. Once I was told it was Chinese lanterns I let my excitement wane. I did not take any images as I knew my camera phone would not capture what I was seeing. There must be 100's of people that saw this...
trends: There have been 188 other sightings in Austin
There were 3 other sightings in Austin on or around October 12th 2013
Summary: They could have been chinese lanterns but the triangle formation was constant,, Orange lights at each point of triangle. Slowly heading west- gliding underneath clouds.
